name: bug
description: Something isn't working

name: breaking-change
description: Something is going to break when upgrading to this version

name: deprecated
description: A feature will be removed from the project in upcoming version

name: security
description: A feature or bug fix involving a security risk

name: documentation
description: Improvements or additions to documentation

name: duplicate
description: This issue or pull request already exists

name: chore
description: Change to the repository layout or build system

name: maintenance
description: Common maintenance task like dependency updates

name: enhancement
description: New feature or request

name: good first issue
description: Good for newcomers

name: help wanted
description: Extra attention is needed

name: invalid
description: This doesn't seem right

name: question
description: Further information is requested

name: wontfix
description: This will not be worked on

name: priority/high
description: High priority issue or pull request

name: priority/medium
description: Medium priority issue or pull request

name: priority/low
description: Low priority issue or pull request

name: bump:auto
description: Attach to PR to automatically bump version on merge

name: bump:major
description: Attach to PR to automatically bump major version on merge

name: bump:minor
description: Attach to PR to automatically bump minor version on merge

name: bump:patch
description: Attach to PR to automatically bump patch version on merge

name: wip
description: Work In Process

name: complexity:high
description: High complexity issue or pull request

name: complexity:low
description: Low complexity issue or pull request

name: complexity:medium
description: Medium complexity issue or pull request
